Room.Name: entry way
Room.p: This is the entry way. The walls are covered in decorative wallpaper, the floor is marble tile, and the high ceiling is ornately sculpted plaster. A massive crystal chandelier illumnates the room.

Item.Name: note
Item.p: The note says, “To whom it may concern, I, Peabody Carbuncle, being of sound mind and body, do hereby” -- at which point the note ends abruptly, with the last word trailing off in a scrawl.
